BiConstrMgr3.hpp

00001 #ifndef BI_CONSTR_MGR3_HPP
00002 #define BI_CONSTR_MGR3_HPP
00003 
00004 #include "BiConstrMgrBase.hpp"
00005 #include <cstdlib>  // for abs()
00006 
00020 class BiConstrMgr3 : public BiConstrMgrBase
00021 {
00022 public:
00033   bool satisfied(const Cell& cell, 
00034                  unsigned int fromPart, 
00035                  unsigned int toPart) const
00036   {
00037     const int weight = cell.getWeight();
00038     const int diffToOld = _diff[toPart];
00039     const int diffTo = diffToOld + weight;
00040     const int diffFromOld = _diff[fromPart];
00041     const int diffFrom = diffFromOld - weight;
00042     if (diffTo <= _upperBound && diffFrom >= _lowerBound) return true;
00043     return abs(diffFrom - diffTo) < abs(diffFromOld - diffToOld);
00044   }
00045 };
00046 
00049 #endif
